content: so here's the Monster High pieces I made they're made out of prefab furniture
that you can get the craft store like miniature furniture this one is actually
a pulled some necklaces it's a necklace box but I used it for wardrobe I thought
that was a really cool idea now basically all I did was I just based
these black with some black acrylic paint and then painted all the details
with acrylic paint just hand-painted all the details I also gave a little you can
see it's kind of shiny I gave a nice gloss coat of water base gloss and that
sealed it up so so we'll see some details on here so I've got the the
monster high skul on there a little monster high banner some details on the
edge as I paint hand painted I like this too because this is like you can chalk
board you can draw on that so that's kind of fun I also added a few details
inside so open it up so not only does that have hooks or you can hang the
clothes the Monster High clothes but I got some stuff on the door here too cool
for school magenta rocks a little rocky horror there and Frankie was here that
little Specter floating around in the in the wardrobe itself so that came out
really nice and it just closes up and for the second piece it's just a dresser
drawer there and you can see I have the monster high skul I had a little bit of
shading on it take a little more interest then each door I put different
monster hands on which I thought was really cool I also added the detail on
the bottom and on the slides to finish that out so now you can also see on the
drawer pulls I have skulls I thought that was kind of fun and then you can
open the drawers and there's different things in these drawers so that's who
almost lost sight better and there's a spider in that one and spooky eyes and
last one so those are fun that's pretty fun so there we go there's some nice
monster high furniture I just made out of prefab furniture and painted it up
and give me a nice Christmas gift and that's it for today on my crafting
Oh
